name: Recently Renovated Historic Apartment
sectionedDescription/description:
Spacious (1,100 square foot) and private (will not be share with host or other guests) accommodation on Historic Marion, the heart of the Wonderful Mountain Empire of Virginia.
This three-bedroom, two bath apartment was fully renovated in 2021 and features hardwood floors throughout, HVAC heating and cooling, WIFI and cable television.
Walk within a few minutes to the many uniques restaurants in downtown Marion, or prepare your own meals in the fully-equipped kitchen.

The apartment will NOT be share with host or other guests, we love for you to enjoy all the comfort and privacy it offers, will also available to assist you with any support or amenities that you might need. 
The entire apartment accommodated 6 guests, in  one queen bed, one full, and two extra-long twins beds.

Convenient to the Lincoln Theatre, Back of the Dragon, Hungry Mother State Park, and the Mt. Rogers National Recreation Area.Approximate 60 minutes from Bristol Motor Speedway. 
Park at the door and walk up 20 steps.

-Before rental you need to submit the names of all occupants. 
-No subletting is allowed.   
-There shall NOT be smoking, vaping, e-cigarettes allowed inside the apartment. Extra cleaning fees ($1,000.00 dollars) minimum charge to remove odor and stains, eviction from Rental Unit.
-Pets are NOT allow in this property. Unauthorized Pets $500.00 dollars, plus any damages and additional cleaning cost incurred, eviction for rental unit without refund.
-Guest(s) are only allowed to be accompanied by members of the party, no additional visitor who is not member of the party or in the list.
-Damaged or Missing items varies depending on cost of items.
-Complaints, or potential warning issues, if necessary, eviction, without refund and a charge of up to $500.00 dollars.
-NO opening any of the windows.
-NO PARTIES or EVENTS
-PLEASE WASH YOUR DISHES after used; sink, dish-washing machine and soap are available.
-Excessive cleaning Up to $150.00 per hour of additional cleaning needed
-Prefer NO shoes in the apartment
-NO candles.
-Do not alter or tamper with security system, if you do, your stay will be immediately terminated without refund.
-There is no video surveillance monitoring in the interior of the apartment.
-For all stays over 28 days, we require access to the unit for maintenance, you will be inform one day before maintenance occurs. 
-We can provide you with a pack n play or toddler bed if you ask for one before you stay.
-Illegal downloads are forbidden.
-Before checking out, take out any food and garbage, trash must be in a trash bag. You will find the garbage bins outside down the stairs.
Thank you!
sectionedDescription/space:
The apartment will NOT be share with host or other guests, we love for you to enjoy all the comfort and privacy it offers, will also available to assist you with any support or amenities that you might need. 
The entire apartment accommodated 6 guests, in  one queen bed, one full, and two extra-long twins beds.
sectionedDescription/summary:
Spacious (1,100 square foot) and private (will not be share with host or other guests) accommodation on Historic Marion, the heart of the Wonderful Mountain Empire of Virginia.
This three-bedroom, two bath apartment was fully renovated in 2021 and features hardwood floors throughout, HVAC heating and cooling, WIFI and cable television.
Walk within a few minutes to the many uniques restaurants in downtown Marion, or prepare your own meals in the fully-equipped kitchen.
sectionedDescription/transit:
Convenient to the Lincoln Theatre, Back of the Dragon, Hungry Mother State Park, and the Mt. Rogers National Recreation Area.Approximate 60 minutes from Bristol Motor Speedway. 
Park at the door and walk up 20 steps.

No smoking inside house.

sectionedDescription/description:
Our place is private. We offer 3 queen beds, 1 twin bed, and  1 queen and 2 twin air mattresses. . Located two miles from Trailhead 10 and we are close to Williamson park and ride.
Our 2nd bathroom is the mud room. Guests don’t have to worry about that mud. Take a hot shower and wash your clothes. 
We offer a full kitchen or a grill to cook on. There is a fire pit to relax of the evening. Southside mall is only two miles away and the best eating is right here in Williamson area.

We are within walking distance of our rental property. Should the guests have issues or need anything, we are very close by.

Southside mall and wal mart is 3 miles away.

Please be sure to check out our special winter pricing!

primaryHost/about: I taught school for 13 years. I assist my husband with our rental property. I enjoy painting and fixing up property.
sectionedDescription/access:
Quail Rd is the first green state rd. sign to the left past Buffalo Trail Resort.
Go over the bridge and stay to the left. Stay straight.
Go to the very end of Quail Rd and the house has a red roof.
Trucks and trailers HAVE TO ENTER the upper left gravel driveway and turn left. This driveway loops downward. You drive to the lower end and backup your trailer into the graveled area in the corner. Two trucks and trailers can park in this corner. This will allow more room for trucks and trailers to park on the lower gravel. Large trailers over 30ft need to exit out the upper gravel road where you entered.
sectionedDescription/description:
Large spacious house for families and friends! Ride your ATV anywhere! No trailering to HM trails (Pocahontas 2 miles)  Indian Ridge, Pinnacle, Warrior, Spearhead & the Outlaw Trails! Lots of parking for many trailers! With all the ATVs going by on 71, there's peace and quiet on this nestled 4 acres up the hill at the end of Quail Rd.  Grill on the patio, stay warm in the family room with a gas fireplace, or sit by the fire pit. Restaurants, gas, grocery, car wash, and laundromat nearby.

Main Bedroom One has 1 king bed
Bedroom Two has 1 queen bed and 3 twin beds
Bedroom Three has 2 queen beds 
Bedroom Four has 1 queen bed and 1 twin bed
Bedroom Five has 1 queen 
The large family room is 20 x 30 and has a Lazyboy pullout sofa and there’s an Airbed available

Quail Rd is the first green state rd. sign to the left past Buffalo Trail Resort.
Go over the bridge and stay to the left. Stay straight.
Go to the very end of Quail Rd and the house has a red roof.
Trucks and trailers HAVE TO ENTER the upper left gravel driveway and turn left. This driveway loops downward. You drive to the lower end and backup your trailer into the graveled area in the corner. Two trucks and trailers can park in this corner. This will allow more room for trucks and trailers to park on the lower gravel. Large trailers over 30ft need to exit out the upper gravel road where you entered.

Guests can contact me through email, text or call my phone.

Children play in the road so drive slowly on Quail Rd. Sometimes the neighbor's little dog will come up the driveway. He is a friendly dog.

Trailers enter at the upper, left gravel driveway and exit at the lower driveway.  Stay on the gravel especially with wet weather because the ground is slippery on the hillside. Don't park in front of the house.  You can drive your ATV on the gravel behind the house and unload at the patio.

Quiet hours are between 12pm and 6am.

Looking for a thrilling outdoor experience? Our resort boasts miles of world-class ATV trails that are perfect for adventurers of all levels. name: Hillbilly Hideout
photos/0/caption: Open floorplan complete with game room & full kitchen! Includes custom chess/checkerboard, pool table, pac man arcade game, dart board, cornhole boards and massaging recliner! Yes, you heard that right! A massaging recliner!!
sectionedDescription/access: You will get the entire place to yourself!
sectionedDescription/description:
Whether you're looking to ride the Hatfield-McCoy Trails or plan a weekend getaway, this cabin is perfect for you!
Hillbilly Hideout is located in historical downtown Williamson, just 0.3 miles from the Trail #10 connector. If you get rained out, no worries! Take advantage of the GAME ROOM equipped with a pool table, pac-man, checkers, darts, cornhole boards and Foosball table or sit back and relax in our massaging recliner.

We're also available on Facebook!

Hillbilly Hideout is a newly renovated rental unit with plenty of space for your family or closest friends! The large open concept features 2 bedrooms with a full-size bed and twin bunks in one room and queen size bed and twin bunks in the other. 

It also has a full kitchen equipped with a stove/oven, microwave,  keurig, coffee pot, utensils, pots/pans, etc. , a large living area, dining room and game room for your entertainment.

Outside, you can sit and relax around the fire pit or grill your favorites with a large charcoal grill located under the gazebo.

You will get the entire place to yourself!

Someone is always available! Just call/text Grady (304-928-0484) or Danielle (304-928-7582).

We are located right in the middle of historic downtown Williamson, WV.

There are several locally owned restaurants and gas stations within walking distance for your convenience!

Williamson is ATV friendly, so feel free to ride your SXS right in town, walk and enjoy the scenery or drive to any of your local restaurants or gas stations. 

You can drive just a few miles up the road to access your favorite chain restaurants or grocery stores/Walmart.

We will send you a message with complete check-in/out instructions in addition to your custom code for keyless entry prior to your scheduled arrival.

Check-in: 3:00pm or after
Check-out: 11:00am

We always do our best to accommodate our guests. If available, we allow early check-in and/or late check-out at no additional cost! Just give us a call prior to your arrival.

primaryHost/about:
I am from Lexington, NC. I have 2 boys and a beautiful wife. I have a vacuum business that allows me to travel all over the United States. We love riding as a family. It is great family time. This is what we want to provide a great relaxing trip for friends and family to enjoy. 
Don't put off what you can do today because tomorrow is never promised!

sectionedDescription/access: Our location boasts access to all the local fun & attractions including Riders Inn (Local Bar & Grill), The Creek trails, Rebel Ridge, The View, The Goldfish Pond, and the Wagon Wheel.
sectionedDescription/description:
We are located in Northfork WV at the Hatfield and McCoy trail systems, we are directly on the Outlaw trails .  We offer a fully furnished home to rent in the area. Jake's Grocery is located at the end of the road on the corner. We are around a mile away from Ashland Resort, so there is access to gas while you ride. We offer access to tours of the area and trail systems, we also have connections for you to rent ATVs and UTVs if needed. Easy access to the house from Highway 52.

This is a HOUSE with all the house comforts. Way more room than you would believe by looking from the outside.

Our location boasts access to all the local fun & attractions including Riders Inn (Local Bar & Grill), The Creek trails, Rebel Ridge, The View, The Goldfish Pond, and the Wagon Wheel.

Text or call 336-240-6445 or 704-308-8610

Quite and laid back. No drama! Swing on the porch and enjoy the WV mountains!

Ride your sxs, four wheelers,dirt bikes on the road anywhere

name: Mountain Momma - clean and convenient!
photos/4/caption: Seating for 6, wings fold down for more space around the room.
photos/10/caption: Extra towels, cleaning products, linens available in the living room closet.
primaryHost/about: I am a husband, a father of four and I enjoy good books.  We are a pretty relaxed family and we are very active in our community in southern West Virginia.  Please contact me with any concerns.
sectionedDescription/access: It’s all yours!
sectionedDescription/description:
Mountain Momma is an above-garage apartment in Iaeger, WV.  We are located just a few miles from the Outlaw Trails trailhead at Wilmore Dam, and 12 miles from the Hatfield McCoy trailhead in Welch.  Other nearby HM trails are in Gilbert and War.   The newly-remodeled home offers two bedrooms and one bathroom, with additional sleeping in the living room.   The kitchen has concrete countertops and soft-close cabinets.  A Dollar General store is 1/4 mile away, and we have parking for ATV's.

All of the work on this apartment was completed by 120+ volunteers from 10+ states in 2018-2019.  As Covid-19 has ended the mentoring internship program typically hosted in this housing, we are turning over a new leaf.

It’s all yours!

Our family lives adjacent to this building in our split-level home.  We have young kids who are very friendly and polite!  We will give you your space but are available for whatever you might need.  Our heart is to serve you, see to it you enjoy the stay and earn your 5-star review

We are on Route 52 in Iaeger, the main road in our county.  This is a safe small-town place.

Parking is across the street in an open field for vehicles with trailers.  If no trailer, use the driveway if it's convenient for you.

sectionedDescription/description:
Hello, River 2 Ridge Outfitters is a newly remodeled 3 BR, 2 Bath house. We can accommodate up to 12 people in beds. Full kitchen, LR, dining room, washer/dryer, garage mud room, fire pit, SXS wash station, covered storage, and free WiFi.  Perfect location in southern WV to ride/hike the beautiful mountains. We are approximately 1.5 miles from trails that link with HM Trail system (Buffalo Mtn)accessible from lodge, so you don’t have to trailer machines.Any questions contact us at 304-784-1719.

8 miles from Williamson, WV 
With several restaurants in the area.

We are available 24/7 for our guests

name: A Bit Of Heaven Rental:Calvary House Warrior Trail
photos/1/caption: Perfect for families or small groups. Cozy, clean, comfortable relaxing area for after you have played on the trails all day.
photos/2/caption: Spacious living room with 65" TV.  Streaming firestick. High speed internet and wifi.
photos/3/caption:
Well stocked eat in kitchen with pots pans, dishes, utensils. Also has a crockpot,  mixer, and a toaster.
Perfect for preparing a meal when you return home.
photos/5/caption:
Bedroom #1 features 2 comfy Queen size beds with clean linens and extra blankets. Attached Jack and Jill Bathroom. 
Clothes hanging rod with hangers.
photos/6/caption:
Bedroom #2 features 2 comfy Queen size beds with clean linens and extra blankets. Attached Jack and Jill Bathroom.
Clothes hanging rod with hangers.
photos/7/caption: The main bathroom is a Jack and Jill bathroom located between the two bedrooms. Fully stocked with towels and anything you may need during your stay.
photos/8/caption: 5' deep tub with ceramic tile shower. Clean towels are also proviided.
photos/10/caption: Laundry area with washer and dryer.
photos/13/caption: Relax under the stars at night and enjoy time with your friends and family around the fire pit.
photos/15/caption:
This house is a duplex. This unit sleeps 8, you can also book the Calvary Suite with it for larger groups. With both units will sleep a total of 14.
Fenced in private yard.
photos/16/caption: Plenty of parking for trucks and trailers. Pull through driveway off of back alley.
photos/18/caption: Electronic lock for fast and efficient check in
photos/20/caption: Road in the picture is Warriormine Rd. Located one street over Calvary. House is circled in blue.
photos/23/caption: Rick and I own A Scoop of Heaven. The best icecream in town. Stop by and say hey and we will give you 10% off.
photos/24/caption: The Owl serves inexpensive but tasty breakfast, lunch and dinner 6 days a week. Open 8am-8pm and 12 noon-5:30 on Sundays
photos/25/caption: Located directly around the corner of the Warrior trailhead office. Sells HMT passes as well as souvenirs.  Open from 9am-2 daily.
photos/26/caption: Berwind Lake boating, and trout fishing
primaryHost/about:
My husband and I relocated to West Virginia in 2014 from Ohio. We run a ministry (A New Beginning) located downtown. 
We opened A Bit of Heaven Rental in Sept. 2018 when the trails opened in our area. We currently have 5 units we rent. We also opened A Scoop of Heaven Icecream in 2021.
We live local across the street from The Calvary House and are available if you need us. We love the small town atmosphere that our town has to offer and the friendly folks that live here.
I love to cook and spend time with our family and grandbabies. 
We enjoy meeting new people, having cookouts in the summer, and going to the lake.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guest has full access to the entire house with a large back yard. Over flow Parking lot across the street for parking trucks with large trailers.
sectionedDescription/description:
Take a step back in time. Rural America. Before fast food chains, and even before Walmart...
Surrounded by mountains and located just a stones throw away (1/4 mile) from Hatfield McCoy's trail head Warrior and many outlaw trails. Enjoy High Rocks and Wilmore Dam, or perhaps a day at Berwind Lake trout fishing, or hiking.
Easy access to restaurants, gas, and grocery store. We are an ATV friendly town and house is located in a friendly Quiet neighborhood with plenty of parking.

The house features 2 bedroom, 2 bath full house that sleeps 8 comfortable. Living room, eat in kitchen and laundry area. The kitchen is fully equipped with dishes, utensils, coffee maker, toaster anything you need. 
Fully equipped with towels, and clean linens are on all the beds. Also a wonderful porch with table, chairs and a propane grill to enjoy the outdoors.
The main bathroom is a Jack and Jill bath between the two bedrooms. 
Living room has a flat screen TV with a fire stick and WIFI.
Like us on Facebook to stay up to date on what's going on in the area.
This house has a suite ( duplex) that can be rented for larger groups.

Guest has full access to the entire house with a large back yard. Over flow Parking lot across the street for parking trucks with large trailers.

Our mission is to make your stay at The Calvary House as enjoyable as possible. 
 We are locally owned and located directly accross the street up on the hill if you need anything. 

 We respect your privacy . We'll give you the space that you want or the help you may need.

We are located around the corner from Warrior Trailhead office. Warrior Trail has direct connections to Pinnacle Creek, Indian Ridge and Pocahontas Trail. 
Located off RT 16 part of the 91 mile Head of the Dragon Motorcycle Ride in McDowell County. Surrounded by beautiful scenery.
 
Quiet Neighborhood in a welcoming small town with all the conveniences.  Restaurants, Grocery Store and gas station and car wash.

War is an ATV friendly town as well as the surrounding communities. 
You can ride in town and directly to the Trailhead.

Day Trips in the area:
86 Miles to New River Gorge
64 Miles to Beckley Exibition Coal Miner Youth Museum

** Check out our other Listings**
Calvary Suite
The Cove House
Cove Suite

name: ATV Riders Choice-Lodging (Welch/Gary area)
sectionedDescription/access:
TRAIL PERMITS:     Purchase permits on line before arrival - 
                                     or purchase in Welch or Bluefield, WV on arrival.

CAUTION:  Drive way is a little steep so be careful when backing out so 
                        your vehicle doesn't drag.
sectionedDescription/description:
Most Popular Rental
Midway between Warrior, Indian,
& Pinnacle Trails -with connector
to Pocahontas Trail. (400 miles to ride)
Garage to lock ATV's

     ⁕     Ample parking 
     ⁕     Ride ATV's anywhere in area. 
     ⁕     Close to Gas & Food.
     ⁕     NEWLY Remodeled.
     ⁕     Charcoal Grill   
     ⁕     4 Roku TV's

✔    PARKING:  Both sides of road, side of house, driveway, or in a locked garage                      
 
 ✔    TURN AROUND SPACE:  1/4 mile past house for extra long trailer.

✔    TRAIL ACCESS:  Only  5  minutes to Warrior Trail on ATV.           
         IOr ride Indian Ridge, Pinnacle, & Pocahontas Trails.  
         (Over 400 miles to ride.)

✔    GAS & FOOD:  Only 2.7 miles to City of Gary (Gas,  Delicious 
       Take-out Food & Golf Course).

✔    GAS & FOOD:  Only 2.5 miles to City of Welch (Gas, Restaurants, 
        Groceries, Parts & Repairs, Hospital, Theatre, Playground, 
        Basketball/Tennis Courts & Outdoor Pool.

HOUSE
✔    NEWLY REMODELED: 3 small bedrooms with 6 single beds.  Each 
        person has their own extra comfortable bed.  

✔    FULL BATH :  NEW tub & shower -  hand held shower wand - &
        extra large bath towels.  

✔    STARTER PACK:  toilet paper, paper towels, detergent, &  
        Keurig Coffee machine and cups.

TRAIL PERMITS:     Purchase permits on line before arrival - 
                                     or purchase in Welch or Bluefield, WV on arrival.

CAUTION:  Drive way is a little steep so be careful when backing out so 
                        your vehicle doesn't drag.

Check-in with a keypad.  
You will receive keypad # once booked.

I  am available 24/7 to answer any questions &
give help in any way to make your stay enjoyable.

Trail stickers can be purchased in Welch at the Little General Store,
 or at the Bantam Market in Welch.  
You can purchase them online before you arrive & save yourself some time.

✔     Quiet neighborhood  just off main road.

✔      Ride ATV or SXS anywhere in area to trails & supplies.


✔       Smack dab in the middle of Warrior Trail, Indian Ridge Trail, & Pinnacle 
          Creek Trails 

✔       Anawalt Lake (fishing) Stocked by State of WV with largemouth bass 
           bluegill, catfish, & trout
           
 ✔       Gary Golf Course

✔  Less than 5 minutes to Warrior Trail.

✔  2  miles to Gary Market (gas, delicious take-out food, snacks).

✔  3  miles to City of Welch (Groceries, Restaurants, Gas, Auto &
       ATV Parts/Repair, Hospital, Theatre, Basketball/Tennis Court, Pool)

✔  No parties are allowed.
 
✔  Two policeman live in the area, so it is a very safe, family friendly 
      area.

✔   Enjoy your stay in Wild, Wonderful West Virginia.

additionalHouseRules:
- No hunting on property.
- Garbage must be collected and put out in trash can.
- Please leave house in order found it and clean up any major messes.  Clean all dishes, etc. used.  
- Use coasters on all wood surfaces under drink cups.
- Turn off all interior lights when you leave but leave exterior lights on.
- You may adjust the two thermostats for your comfort.
- You may not capture, kill or take off the premise any animals including but not limited to birds, turtles, lizards, frogs, snakes, deer, rabbits, etc. You may not disturb birds nesting .
- There is photo album with pictures showing the cabin refurbishment and a write up.  You may not remove or touch any of the items in the photo album.  You may not copy or take pictures of the photo album. Please wash your hands before you view the photo album.

primaryHost/about: Love animals, dogs specifically, the outdoors, hiking, gardening, kayaking, golfing and spending time with my husband, children and friends.  I am a Forensic and Tax Accountant.
sectionedDescription/access: All parts of the house are accessible.
sectionedDescription/description:
Beautifully restored 1830's log home with great room addition and all modern amenities with country charm.  Close to hiking and golfing at the Greenbrier Resort and Pipestem State Park, Bluestone Lake, white water rafting down the New River, antiquing, skiing at Winter Place, and the quaint railroad town of Hinton.  Close to America's favorite small town of Lewisburg where shopping and dining choices are abundant.

The log home is a great launching point to visit the Greenbrier Resort, Pipestem State Park, Blue Stone Lake, The New River Gorge, Winter Place, Lewisburg and Beckley. We are about 20 miles from Winterplace; it's an easy drive.

All parts of the house are accessible.

My manager Susie is available throughout your stay to assist with any needs.  Her cell phone will be provided upon booking.

The log home is a great launching point to visit the Greenbrier Resort, Pipestem State Park, Blue Stone Lake, The New River Gorge, Lewisburg, and Beckley.  Hinton is 3 miles from the log home and has a grocery store,  a pharmacy, and several places to eat. We like the Market.

Amtrak comes to the Greenbrier.

The cabin is located near a sulfur spring so sometimes the water can have that strong sulfur smell.  Bring bottled water for drinking.

sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: The log home is a great launching point to visit the Greenbrier Resort, Pipestem State Park, Blue Stone Lake, The New River Gorge, Lewisburg, and Beckley.  Hinton is 3 miles from the log home and has a grocery store,  a pharmacy, and several places to eat. We like the Market.
sectionedDescription/notes: The cabin is located near a sulfur spring so sometimes the water can have that strong sulfur smell.  Bring bottled water for drinking.
sectionedDescription/space: The log home is a great launching point to visit the Greenbrier Resort, Pipestem State Park, Blue Stone Lake, The New River Gorge, Winter Place, Lewisburg and Beckley. We are about 20 miles from Winterplace; it's an easy drive.
sectionedDescription/summary: Beautifully restored 1830's log home with great room addition and all modern amenities with country charm.  Close to hiking and golfing at the Greenbrier Resort and Pipestem State Park, Bluestone Lake, white water rafting down the New River, antiquing, skiing at Winter Place, and the quaint railroad town of Hinton.  Close to America's favorite small town of Lewisburg where shopping and dining choices are abundant.
sectionedDescription/transit: Amtrak comes to the Greenbrier.

name: Red Dirt ATV Resort
sectionedDescription/access: You and your guests will have full access to the entire property including the pool, the kids play area and the additional lot for parking.
sectionedDescription/description:
This 3 bed 2 bath home sits right in the heart of atv country. You will have access to the Spearhead trails of Va and the Hatfield and Mccoy trails in Wv. After a long day of riding you can come back and relax by the pool or hang out inside with cable tv and WiFi. This home can easily house 10 people with room to spare. We also have a children’s play area and lots of parking 2 1/2 acres attached so you will have plenty of room for your trailers.  $500 Refundable Damage deposit required.

Along with having three trails systems to choose from, you will have full access to our pool area that includes outside seating and a grill.

You and your guests will have full access to the entire property including the pool, the kids play area and the additional lot for parking.

We want to thank you for staying with us.  Message us and we will answer you as quickly as possible.

Spearhead Trails, Hatfield McCoy Trails and the Pocahontas Trail Head

Parking available at the house and additional parking above the house. There is a sharp turn on Dunn rd. Largest truck and trailer up hill is 24’ enclosed behind a long bed dually.

primaryHost/about: Adventure seeking and nature lover!
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access:
The Main Lodge is only rented to one group at a time. Only Your group will be inhabiting the house during your stay.  Our beautiful 5 bed room, 2 bath + bonus room with lounge is # 1 in Hatfield McCoy lodging. Visit our social media pages for a video walk through and keep up with the latest up dates to the  Busted Atv Resort  2000+ square foot Main Lodge. Holiday weekends are three night minimum.

Months that have cooler below freezing temperatures we do shut down the ATV pressure washer, guest laundry and outdoor showers.
sectionedDescription/description:
Ride dirty, Sleep clean! Busted ATV Resort offers you the very best in accommodations to ride the Hatfield McCoy trails.

The remodeled historic 1880 Bramwell House and adjacent  accommodations at the base of Mt. Me offer spacious accommodations with parking. Just a mile from Hatfield McCoy trail head and 5 miles from Virginia Spearhead trails. Pinnacle Rock State park and  Look Out is just one mile from our front door.

The Main Lodge is only rented to one group at a time. Only Your group will be inhabiting the house during your stay.  Our beautiful 5 bed room, 2 bath + bonus room with lounge is # 1 in Hatfield McCoy lodging. Visit our social media pages for a video walk through and keep up with the latest up dates to the  Busted Atv Resort  2000+ square foot Main Lodge. Holiday weekends are three night minimum.

Months that have cooler below freezing temperatures we do shut down the ATV pressure washer, guest laundry and outdoor showers.

Please feel free to call or text anytime.

The Busted ATV Resort is owned and operated by ATV nuts, for ATV nuts. Offering you the comforts of home including everything you need for the perfect stay.
 
Main lodge -Central heat and air, ceiling fans, wifi, smart streaming Tv's, large front porch, plenty of parking for your ATVs and Trailers, outdoor boot wash station,  Turbo Master Boot Dryer, laundry and more.

Winter Rates (November  13th - March 18th) are special accommodations that you must first contact us for availability and pricing before booking will be accepted . 

Here at Busted ATV Resort, one of the ways we offer you large beautifully remolded homes for a Great Price In-season months (April - October)is by Winterizing our homes during the cold months. This greatly reduces our cost and yours. If your planing a winter trip and would like to use the Resort contact us first. We require a 90 day notice on Bookings from mid November to Mid March.   Don't forget to follow us online for the latest info on Busted.

primaryHost/about: I am a motor head for as long as I can remember and enjoy spending time in Tazewell so much I decided to build my own AirBnB and share my passion with others.
sectionedDescription/access:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

Complete your Back of the Dragon experience with a Vanderhall Venice GT. This  ultra rare roadster will let you experience the open road like never before. Receive an extra 25% discount when staying at The Dragon's Den!

The driveway is at an angle. Please review the pictures to see best way to park your motorcycles. if you are coming in with a truck/trailer it is best to unload towards the top of the driveway. once you have unloaded park the truck/trailer at the top of the driveway in the grass leaving plenty of room for bikes to get in and out.

MOTORCYCLES BEWARE
PARKING: The easiest way to park is to come in towards the bottom/street side, turn towards the hill, then back your motorcycle towards the street and make sure to leave it in gear.

LEAVING: Make sure to go slow enough that you can stop at the bottom of the driveway. Due to the hills and landscape you cannot see oncoming traffic and cars drive a little fast on Dogwood.


Guests have access to the entire house including fully furnished kitchen, living room with sleeper sofa, dining room with a large dining table and outdoor spaces with comfortable seating.  Each room has a queen bed, 40" HD Smart TV, towels and soaps/laundry supplies.
sectionedDescription/description:
Minutes from downtown shopping and dining and easy access to the infamous Back of the Dragon.  Only one hour drive to Winterplace Ski Resort, WV.  High speed wireless internet throughout the entire property.    40" HD Smart TV in every room. Enjoy staying in a c. 1900 home that has been recently refurbished with the modern touches people are looking for.  Enjoy this fully furnished home away from home and travel safe with your loved ones.  Rent the entire house or individual rooms.

Enjoy The Back of the Dragon in a whole new way with the Vanderhall Venice GT!  An open air roadster experience like no other available from The Dragon's Den! Available on Riders Share.

Fully furnished 5 bedroom/2 bathroom in the heart of Tazewell, VA.  Each room has it's own smart lock, queen bed and a smart TV for access to your favorite streaming service.  A dresser with mirror is also in each room. WiFi is available throughout the house inside and out.  The sofa is a sleeper sofa available to whole house rentals only. Full size washer and dryer also included at no additional cost.  Enjoy the views while admiring the deer that can be found wandering around the property most mornings and evenings.

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY

Complete your Back of the Dragon experience with a Vanderhall Venice GT. This  ultra rare roadster will let you experience the open road like never before. Receive an extra 25% discount when staying at The Dragon's Den!

The driveway is at an angle. Please review the pictures to see best way to park your motorcycles. if you are coming in with a truck/trailer it is best to unload towards the top of the driveway. once you have unloaded park the truck/trailer at the top of the driveway in the grass leaving plenty of room for bikes to get in and out.

MOTORCYCLES BEWARE
PARKING: The easiest way to park is to come in towards the bottom/street side, turn towards the hill, then back your motorcycle towards the street and make sure to leave it in gear.

LEAVING: Make sure to go slow enough that you can stop at the bottom of the driveway. Due to the hills and landscape you cannot see oncoming traffic and cars drive a little fast on Dogwood.


Guests have access to the entire house including fully furnished kitchen, living room with sleeper sofa, dining room with a large dining table and outdoor spaces with comfortable seating.  Each room has a queen bed, 40" HD Smart TV, towels and soaps/laundry supplies.

I am a phone call away and want to help make sure your stay is as relaxing as possible.  Please do not hesitate to call or text throughout your stay for advice and what to see and where to eat. Once you book you will receive a message within one hour with my contact information.

Come explore historic downtown Tazewell, VA and everything it has to offer.  Tazewell Main Street has become one of the only 30 designated main streets in VA! Less than one mile to shopping, breweries and restaurants. Tazewell is a beautiful place to relax and call home for the weekend.

Tazewell, VA and the Back of the Dragon is the first and only designated motorcycle route in the state of Virginia.  Come enjoy this beautiful 33 mile road that takes your through three mountain passes from Tazewell to Marion, VA.

Tazewell does not have Uber/Lyft. if you need a taxi 2 brothers is usually 30 minutes away.

While we do have cameras monitoring the driveway and front porch to keep you and your bikes/cars safe from roaming dragons, unlike most other area rentals there are NO RECORDING DEVICES inside the house.

photos/25/caption: The 2 lane, paved, and lit alley behind the house

sectionedDescription/access: Guests get the whole house and the surrounding yard.
sectionedDescription/description:
Guests may use the entire house, 184 E. Water St., the yard, and the driveway. 
The house was built in 1883 and was occupied by my grandparents, my father actually grew up in this house. This was a Pocahontas Fuel company house.

The house has a living room, dining room, kitchen, four bedrooms, and 1.5 bathrooms. There is a large front porch with rocking chairs and a swing. A mudroom is off of the kitchen. You’re welcome to park in the driveway behind the house and put ATVs in the roped off area of the backyard. Trailers and trucks must be parked in the alley, but please don’t block the alley. Cars can be parked in front of the house.

Guests get the whole house and the surrounding yard.

I live 5 miles away so I am readily available. My phone number is 843–801– 2515. You can either call me or text and I keep my phone available at all times when I have a renter

Pocahontas is an ATV friendly town during day light hours. Please be considerate of noise, this house is in a residential section and the town quiet hours are 10 PM to 7 AM. Also please be respectful of Sunday morning church hours

There is a lockbox on the front door with two door keys in it. I will text you the code for the lock box once the house has been cleaned from the previous renters. The gate to the backyard has a lock on it and the key is hanging on a nail in the kitchen beside the back door. When you are leaving please put the gate key back on that nail and put the door keys back in the lock box.
sectionedDescription/houseRules: The town of Pocahontas requires that all trailers and ATV must be parked behind the house in the alley. Cars and trucks may park on the street in front of the house. I allow parking in my gated back yard and also in the driveway beside my garage
sectionedDescription/interaction: I live 5 miles away so I am readily available. My phone number is 843–801– 2515. You can either call me or text and I keep my phone available at all times when I have a renter

primaryHost/about: My family and I love making friends as we travel. We're happiest outdoors and we're always looking for that next great hiking trail, fishing stream, or million-dollar view.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Situated on 6 wooded acres in a private mountain river cove outside Damascus, VA , our cozy, newly renovated 3-story A-frame cottage property fronts the cliff-flanked, trout-stocked South Fork Holston River. The cottage features 3 spacious bedrooms, each on its own level; a fully equipped kitchen; great room; dining room; laundry room; and a 2nd-floor loft with pool table and doorway to the 16'-wide balcony. A 20' x 12' front deck offers space for outdoor relaxing and dining.

The cabin is beautifully decorated with an eclectic array of antiques, rustic pieces, industrial elements, and original artwork  and prints. The hardwood floors, white pine-clad walls, and timber framing all lend to the cozy cabin feel of the interior while  the steel and cable interior railings provide a tasteful industrial balance. The 2-tones of the more rustic board & batten and cedar shake exterior siding are offset by the dramatic use of structural steel for the balcony supports and deck and balcony railings.

We aren't local, but we're only a phone call or text away! We have local friends who are ready to help with any urgent needs.

The best thing about our river home is its surroundings. A short walk down our tree-lined driveway brings you to the beautiful river and the dramatic cliffs that flank the opposite side. Privately stocked with large rainbows and home to wild brookies, rainbows and browns, this section is a fisherman's paradise. Along privately maintained Little Rock Road, our stretch of river gets no pressure from the public. If fishing's not your thing, the river bank offers the perfect spot for hammock lounging/reading, taking in the scenery, or getting lost in the sounds of rushing mountain water.

Though situated in a private mountain river cove, our cottage is only 15 minutes from the amazing 35-mile Virginia Creeper Trail, a multi-purpose former railway accessed from charming Damascus VA (visitdamascus.org). The trail traverses miles of national forest and crosses numerous vintage rail trestles spanning rushing mountain whitewater. Local outfitters offer bike rentals and shuttles to the trail heads for a mostly peddle-free downhill ride through the incredible landscape. Affectionately monikered "Trail Town USA", in addition to the famous Virginia Creeper Trail, Damascus is a favorite stopover town on the Georgia-to-Maine Appalachian Trail. The town is home to many other hiking/biking trails, mountain rivers, waterfalls, caves and other natural attractions. The cottage is only 20 minutes from historic downtown Abingdon VA (visitabingdonvirginia.com). Abingdon is home to the historic and popular Barter Theatre (Est. 1933, Blt. 1829) - State Theater of VA;  the Martha Washington Inn & Spa (1832); The Tavern Restaurant (1779); and many other beautiful historic buildings, homes, sights, and wonderful restaurants and shops. Abingdon hosts many popular festivals throughout the year and was designated by USA Today as the Country's Best Small Town Food Scene in 2019 and 2020.

The property is quite remote; one of its most attractive features, in our opinion. A tradeoff is that our internet service is DSL. Please don't expect the internet speeds you're used to with cable or fiber. Disconnecting other devices while streaming video, attempting to download large files, etc. helps tremendously.

additionalHouseRules:
The Landlord has the right to inspect the premises without prior notice at any time to enforce the terms of this agreement. Should the Tenants violate any of the terms of this agreement, the rental period shall be terminated immediately. The Tenants waive all rights to process if they fail to vacate the premises upon termination of the rental period. The Tenants shall vacate the premises at the expiration time and date of this agreement.

There is an international calling block on the telephone - a calling card is needed for international calls. Emergency medical and police service can be called by dialing 911.

The Tenants shall maintain the premises in a good, clean, and ready to rent condition, and use the premises only in a careful and lawful manner. The tenants shall leave the premises in a ready to rent condition at the expiration of the rental agreement, defined by the Landlord as being immediately habitable by the next tenants. Tenants shall pay for maintenance and repairs should the premises be left in a lesser condition. The tenants agree that the Landlord shall deduct costs of said services from the security deposit prior to refund if tenants cause damage to the premises or its furnishings.

The Tenants shall dispose of all waste material generated during the rental period in a lawful manner and put bagged trash in the bin along the fence near the roadway for pickup. Tenant is cautioned not to leave trash outside because it attracts animals.

The Tenants shall pay for any damage done to the premises over and above normal wear and tear.

No animals or pets of any kind will be brought onto the premises.

The Tenants shall not sublet the property.

The Tenants shall have no more than [RGUESTS_TOTAL] persons reside or sleep on the premises. The Tenants shall notify Landlord immediately if the planned number of guests increases. Tenants renting a unit with per-person charges authorize a charge of $20 per night per person if more than [RGUESTS_TOTAL] persons reside or sleep on the premises.

The Tenants shall behave in a civilized manner and shall be good neighbors respecting the rights of the surrounding property owners. The Tenants shall not create noise or disturbances likely to disturb or annoy the surrounding property owners. Creating a disturbance of the above nature shall be grounds for immediate termination of this agreement and Tenants shall then immediately vacate the premises. Quiet hour starts at 10 PM and Pool and outdoor noise should be kept to a minimum.

There shall be no smoking inside the premises. Smoking is permitted outside the home.

Landlord shall provide towels, linens, cups, knives, forks, spoons, dishes, and other items as commonly used by the Landlord’s family. Toilet paper, soap, dish detergent, laundry soap, shampoos, and other consumables are to be purchased by the Tennant. No reimbursement will be made for unused consumables left at the premises. If consumables exist at the premises when the Tenant arrives the Tenant is free to use them...

The Tenants and Tenants' Guests shall hereby indemnify and hold harmless the Landlord against any and all claims of personal injury or property damage or loss arising from use of the premises regardless of the nature of the accident, injury or loss. Tenants expressly recognize that any insurance for property damage or loss which the Landlord may maintain on the property does not cover the personal property of Tenants, and that Tenants should purchase their own insurance for Tenants and Guests if such coverage is desired.

Tenants agree to pay all reasonable costs, attorney's fees and expenses that shall be made or incurred by Landlord enforcing this agreement.

Tenants expressly acknowledge and agree that this Agreement is for transient occupancy of the Property, and that Tenants do not intend to make the property a residence or household.

We occasionally experience outages that are beyond our control.  We report outages as each occurs.  No refunds or compensation will be given for any outages.

There shall be no refunds of rents due to shortened stays or ruined expectations because of weather conditions.

If the property should go on the MARKET FOR SALE, it may be shown to qualified buyers during the Tenants’ stay.  Every effort will be made to schedule the showing at a convenient time and not interrupt the Tenant’s vacation. Tenant shall allow reasonable viewings of the home between 9 am and 8 PM present or not.

There shall be no refunds of rents because of shortened stays or ruined expectations due to work and family emergencies or other commitments.

It is the tenant’s responsibility to learn about safety precautions, warning signs of water conditions, and safety procedures concerning swimming in or being around the pool. Tenant agrees to have a responsible adult supervising minors while they swim in the pool. Tenant is hereby notified that the pool can be dangerous and tenant accepts fully the risks involved. Tenant is further notified to be cautious when exiting the rear of the home as the pool is open and in close proximity to the entry ways and can be a hazard. There are no rails to prevent a fall into the pool.

Only legally owned and permitted firearms shall be allowed on the premises according to State and local laws.

Tenant agrees that Fireworks and other hazardous materials shall not be used in or around the property.

Tenant shall use the property for legal purposes only and other use, such as but not limited to, illegal drug use, abuse of any person, harboring fugitives, etc. ; shall cause termination of this agreement with no refund of rents or deposits.

Tenant agrees not to access the “owner’s closet”, even if unlocked, which contains cleaning supplies and chemicals that could be hazardous to children and adults. The owners closet is located just inside the main front entry way.

Tenant is advised that the property contains a gas stove and cook top, gas heating, gas grill, and other gas powered items and will seek help from management if the proper operation of such items is not fully understood.

The property has a fire extinguisher installed near the kitchen area. The fire extinguisher was fully charged at last inspection. It is the duty of the tenant to inform management immediately should the fire extinguisher become less than fully charged. Tenant agrees to use the fire extinguisher only for true emergencies.

The property has fire alarms installed and they are believed to function properly at the time of rental. Tennant will notify management without delay if a fire alarm “chirps” or has a low battery condition.

Tenant is advised that there is no carbon monoxide detector on the property and accepts the risk involved in not having one.

Tenant shall see to their own security while in the property by locking doors, windows, garage doors, etc. when it’s prudent to do so.

Valuable items left behind by tenant will be held for the tenant and every reasonable effort will be made to contact the tenant for return. If items are not claimed for longer than 6 months they shall become the property of the Landlord. The Landlord shall not be held liable for condition of said items.

Cable TV is provided and service level has been chosen by the Landlord. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, or personal preferences with regard to cable TV service.

High speed wireless internet is provided as a convience only and is not integral to the agreement. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, speed, access problems, lack of knowledge of use, or personal preferences with regard to internet service.

Tenant agrees that Air conditioning shall not be set below 73 degrees and heat shall not be set above 78, and that the fan setting shall be “Auto”. Doors and windows shall be closed when either heat or air conditioning is in operation.

(Applicable only if "Trail Map Tablet" is rented) Tenant understands that the Trail Map Tablet is provided "as is," and that the maps installed on the tablet were created by a third party and have not been verified for accuracy, safety, legality or difficulty by Landlord. Tenant agrees to follow all applicable federal, state and local laws, and Hatfield-McCoy Trails' rules and regulations as applicable, when using the Trail Map Tablet. Tenant shall agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Landlord from liability and claim for damages that arise from use of the Trail Map Tablet, including but not limited to: injury, illness, death, property damage, and criminal charges.

(Applicable only if "Trail Map Tablet" is rented) Tenant agrees that in the event the Trail Map Tablet is lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed, Tenant will be billed according to the following schedule: $50 for mounting hardware, $150 for Trail Map Tablet. Loss of or damage to Trail Map Tablet must be reported immediately to Landlord, and broken items must be brought back to Four Wheeler Heaven. Tenant acknowledges that the Trail Map Tablet is not waterproof, and that it should not be submerged in water or used in rainy or snowy conditions.

primaryHost/about: I love the outdoors, especially riding the trails and exploring the mountains. I grew up and raised my family here enjoying the vast offroad trails this area has to offer, often riding all day to return at dusk with my son on his 90cc and me on my 325 Polaris.  We offer our guests the same opportunity but now the trails are mapped and marked  to make exploring easier.
rootAmenitySections/1/subtitle: The host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide detector on the property.
sectionedDescription/access: Guests have access to private, secure parking for vehicles, trailers and ATVs; a heated swimming pool shared with other guests; and a back yard.
sectionedDescription/description:
This 3BR 2BA house with pool, is located Trailside at the Hatfield McCoy Pocahontas Trailhead at Coaldale WV. Direct access to Pocahontas Spearhead Trail in VA and 500mi of OFF Road adventures from our location On Rt 52 just 13 miles from I-77 exit 1

This upstairs unit features 3 bedroom, 2 full baths with a full kitchen, dining room, sun room, living room and a washer/dryer. It will sleep 10 or 12 and is fully equipped with towels, linens, utensils, coffeemaker, full size fridge, oven, pots/pans, microwave and crock pot, grills, picnic tables, fire-pits, basically everything you need to cook or heat up your meals. There is plenty of room to park your vehicles and unhook your trailers to be ready to go out on the town after a full day of trail riding or just kick back relax and enjoy the amenities. Direct "Trailhead" access to over 500 miles of West Virginia's Trails and Virginia's most popular trails. Ride Four Hatfield McCoy trail systems from our "Trailside" location: Pocahontas, Indian Ridge, Pinnacle and the new Warrior Trails and Virginia's Spearhead trails. We offer Trail permits, Trail GPS tablets, T-shirts, firewood and Guide services for applicable Fees. Discounts for multiple unit rentals (Coaldale Condo/Miners Den) available.Truly a Four Wheeler Heaven! Rent all three units for complete Privacy including the Pool Too ! Pool in season from Memorial to Labor Days.

Guests have access to private, secure parking for vehicles, trailers and ATVs; a heated swimming pool shared with other guests; and a back yard.

When you book, you'll be given a door code that will unlock the front door during your stay. Owners live 15 minutes away and can be reached by telephone anytime for questions or concerns.

Home is in a rural setting, surrounded by mountains, with few neighbors and many ATV trail systems within riding distance.

Located directly on Route 52, within 15 minute drive of shopping and dining in Bluefield and Princeton, WV. Bramwell is accessible via car (3 minutes) or ATV (15-20 minutes)

Trail permits are REQUIRED to ride on the Hatfield-McCoy Trail System. Please let us know if you need trail permits; we can include them in the total cost of your stay and have them ready when you arrive. Also note that listed rates do not include 12% tax (6% state and 6% local hotel/motel); if you choose to book, your rate will be adjusted 12% to include taxes. Atv rentals are available near by

Tenants expressly recognize that any insurance for property damage or loss which the Landlord may maintain on the property does not cover the personal property of Tenants, and that Tenants should purchase their own insurance for Tenants and Guests if such coverage is desired.

Tenants agree to pay all reasonable costs, attorney's fees and expenses that shall be made or incurred by Landlord enforcing this agreement.

Tenants expressly acknowledge and agree that this Agreement is for transient occupancy of the Property, and that Tenants do not intend to make the property a residence or household.

We occasionally experience outages that are beyond our control.  We report outages as each occurs.  No refunds or compensation will be given for any outages.

There shall be no refunds of rents due to shortened stays or ruined expectations because of weather conditions.

If the property should go on the MARKET FOR SALE, it may be shown to qualified buyers during the Tenants’ stay.  Every effort will be made to schedule the showing at a convenient time and not interrupt the Tenant’s vacation. Tenant shall allow reasonable viewings of the home between 9 am and 8 PM present or not.

There shall be no refunds of rents because of shortened stays or ruined expectations due to work and family emergencies or other commitments.

It is the tenant’s responsibility to learn about safety precautions, warning signs of water conditions, and safety procedures concerning swimming in or being around the pool. Tenant agrees to have a responsible adult supervising minors while they swim in the pool. Tenant is hereby notified that the pool can be dangerous and tenant accepts fully the risks involved. Tenant is further notified to be cautious when exiting the rear of the home as the pool is open and in close proximity to the entry ways and can be a hazard. There are no rails to prevent a fall into the pool.

Only legally owned and permitted firearms shall be allowed on the premises according to State and local laws.

Tenant agrees that Fireworks and other hazardous materials shall not be used in or around the property.

Tenant shall use the property for legal purposes only and other use, such as but not limited to, illegal drug use, abuse of any person, harboring fugitives, etc. ; shall cause termination of this agreement with no refund of rents or deposits.

Tenant agrees not to access the “owner’s closet”, even if unlocked, which contains cleaning supplies and chemicals that could be hazardous to children and adults. The owners closet is located just inside the main front entry way.

Tenant is advised that the property contains a gas stove and cook top, gas heating, gas grill, and other gas powered items and will seek help from management if the proper operation of such items is not fully understood.

The property has a fire extinguisher installed near the kitchen area. The fire extinguisher was fully charged at last inspection. It is the duty of the tenant to inform management immediately should the fire extinguisher become less than fully charged. Tenant agrees to use the fire extinguisher only for true emergencies.

The property has fire alarms installed and they are believed to function properly at the time of rental. Tennant will notify management without delay if a fire alarm “chirps” or has a low battery condition.

Tenant is advised that there is no carbon monoxide detector on the property and accepts the risk involved in not having one.

Tenant shall see to their own security while in the property by locking doors, windows, garage doors, etc. when it’s prudent to do so.

Valuable items left behind by tenant will be held for the tenant and every reasonable effort will be made to contact the tenant for return. If items are not claimed for longer than 6 months they shall become the property of the Landlord. The Landlord shall not be held liable for condition of said items.

Cable TV is provided and service level has been chosen by the Landlord. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, or personal preferences with regard to cable TV service.

High speed wireless internet is provided as a convience only and is not integral to the agreement. No refund of rents shall be given for outages, content, lack of content, speed, access problems, lack of knowledge of use, or personal preferences with regard to internet service.

Tenant agrees that Air conditioning shall not be set below 73 degrees and heat shall not be set above 78, and that the fan setting shall be “Auto”. Doors and windows shall be closed when either heat or air conditioning is in operation.

(Applicable only if "Trail Map Tablet" is rented) Tenant understands that the Trail Map Tablet is provided "as is," and that the maps installed on the tablet were created by a third party and have not been verified for accuracy, safety, legality or difficulty by Landlord. Tenant agrees to follow all applicable federal, state and local laws, and Hatfield-McCoy Trails' rules and regulations as applicable, when using the Trail Map Tablet. Tenant shall agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Landlord from liability and claim for damages that arise from use of the Trail Map Tablet, including but not limited to: injury, illness, death, property damage, and criminal charges.

(Applicable only if "Trail Map Tablet" is rented) Tenant agrees that in the event the Trail Map Tablet is lost, stolen, damaged or destroyed, Tenant will be billed according to the following schedule: $50 for mounting hardware, $150 for Trail Map Tablet. Loss of or damage to Trail Map Tablet must be reported immediately to Landlord, and broken items must be brought back to Four Wheeler Heaven. Tenant acknowledges that the Trail Map Tablet is not waterproof, and that it should not be submerged in water or used in rainy or snowy conditions.
sectionedDescription/interaction: When you book, you'll be given a door code that will unlock the front door during your stay. Owners live 15 minutes away and can be reached by telephone anytime for questions or concerns.
sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: Home is in a rural setting, surrounded by mountains, with few neighbors and many ATV trail systems within riding distance.
sectionedDescription/notes: Trail permits are REQUIRED to ride on the Hatfield-McCoy Trail System. Please let us know if you need trail permits; we can include them in the total cost of your stay and have them ready when you arrive. Also note that listed rates do not include 12% tax (6% state and 6% local hotel/motel); if you choose to book, your rate will be adjusted 12% to include taxes. Atv rentals are available near by
sectionedDescription/space: This upstairs unit features 3 bedroom, 2 full baths with a full kitchen, dining room, sun room, living room and a washer/dryer. It will sleep 10 or 12 and is fully equipped with towels, linens, utensils, coffeemaker, full size fridge, oven, pots/pans, microwave and crock pot, grills, picnic tables, fire-pits, basically everything you need to cook or heat up your meals. There is plenty of room to park your vehicles and unhook your trailers to be ready to go out on the town after a full day of trail riding or just kick back relax and enjoy the amenities. Direct "Trailhead" access to over 500 miles of West Virginia's Trails and Virginia's most popular trails. Ride Four Hatfield McCoy trail systems from our "Trailside" location: Pocahontas, Indian Ridge, Pinnacle and the new Warrior Trails and Virginia's Spearhead trails. We offer Trail permits, Trail GPS tablets, T-shirts, firewood and Guide services for applicable Fees. Discounts for multiple unit rentals (Coaldale Condo/Miners Den) available.Truly a Four Wheeler Heaven! Rent all three units for complete Privacy including the Pool Too ! Pool in season from Memorial to Labor Days.
sectionedDescription/summary: This 3BR 2BA house with pool, is located Trailside at the Hatfield McCoy Pocahontas Trailhead at Coaldale WV. Direct access to Pocahontas Spearhead Trail in VA and 500mi of OFF Road adventures from our location On Rt 52 just 13 miles from I-77 exit 1
sectionedDescription/transit: Located directly on Route 52, within 15 minute drive of shopping and dining in Bluefield and Princeton, WV. Bramwell is accessible via car (3 minutes) or ATV (15-20 minutes)

name: Winterplace Condo! Ski In Ski Out First Floor E101
primaryHost/about: Professional who loves to travel!
sectionedDescription/description:
Winterplace fully furnished condo! Ski in Ski out. First Floor!  - Ashwood Rentals

Newly renovated for the 2023-2024 ski season!!!

New granite countertops!  New custom cabinets!  New floors!  New beds!  Washer/dryer in the condo!  High speed wifi!

No stairs to climb after a long day! No carrying luggage or skis upstairs!

All linens provided

First floor condo with 2 bedrooms and a bunk room.  2 full baths that have just been renovated.  Wood burning fireplace.  Fully furnished with great views of Winterplace!

Ski in ski out!

We highly recommend that you purchase travel insurance. Problems can arise in multiple ways and travel insurance can be a low cost guard against losing your money if you have last minute problems and have to cancel. In the past, some of our guests have obtained insurance by going to various insurance sites for details and to purchase. We did call the people at InsureMyTrip and they do have plans that will cover for Covid issues but there are several important steps and needs to be done shortly after making your first deposit. The plans are called "Cancel For Any Reason" CFAR. Check with your insurance agent before deciding what insurance to purchase. We DO NOT endorse any insurance in particular.


VACATION RENTAL AGREEMENT
This Vacation Rental Agreement (the Agreement) is made by and between  ASHWOOD RENTALS..(HOMEOWNER) and ............................................................. (Guest) as of the date last set forth on the signature page of this Agreement. 
-
For good and valuable consideration, the sufficiency of which is acknowledged, the
parties hereby agree as follows:
1. Property: The vacation rental property is located at:  601 Winterplace Dr.  Unit D104  Ghent, WV 25843
The property is fully furnished and includes:  fully furnished kitchen and linens for beds.  TOWELS ARE NOT PROVIDED
-
2. Maximum Occupancy: The maximum number of guests is limited to 10 persons (including children). 
-
3.Term of the rental: The vacation rental begins at 5:00 p.m. on (“Check-in Date”)
and ends at 11:00 a.m. on (the “Check-out Date”).  Early check ins may be available.  Contact owner if needed.  Failure to adhere to the check-out time may result in an additional late fee set at $50/hour unless discussed in advance of the stay.
-
4. Minimum Stay: This property requires a 2 night minimum stay. Holiday weekends require a 3 night minimum stay.  Longer minimum stays may be required during other periods.
-
5. Rental Rules: Guest agrees to abide by the Rental Rules at all times while at the
property, and shall cause all members of the rental party and anyone else Guest permits on the property to abide by the following rules at all times while residing at the property.  Be respectful of the property and of neighboring guests.   Repeated and/or severe complaints from neighboring guests may result in removal from property without refund.
-
6. Access: Guest shall allow Homeowner access to the property for purposes of repair, inspection or emergency. Homeowner shall exercise this right of access in a reasonable manner by giving at least 2 hours notice (unless in case of emergency).
-
7. Responsible Party: The person reserving and paying for the condo will be the responsible party and must be 25 years of age or older.
-
8. Housekeeping: Your paid reservation includes a charge for cleaning the condo. If, due to unforeseen circumstances (for example, severe weather, housekeeping shortage, etc.), we are unable to clean your condo prior to your stay, you will be refunded the cleaning fee. No other refunds will be given. Before checking-out, please bag and dispose of all trash in the dumpsters located outside, wash and put away the pots and pans, and start the dishwasher. We do not provide daily housekeeping service.
-
9.Pets: Please contact owner about any possible pets for approval. Pet deposit required.
-
10.Smoking: No smoking is permitted inside the dwelling. Failure to abide by this regulation will result in an automatic forfeiture of damage deposit.  Smoking is only allowed in parking lots and dispose of smoking materials properly.
-
11. Property Missing/Damage: Please report any broken, damaged, missing or inoperable items as soon as you notice it. Even if the issue does not affect your stay, we appreciate you letting us know before you check-out so that we can make arrangements to resolve the issue prior to the next guest arrival. Please do not bring cookware or other items from one condo to another. If you have a larger group and book multiple condos, we suggest that you bring paper plates/cups to avoid moving dishes from one condo to another.  Any property in the rental that is removed/broken/abused may be deducted from the security deposit
-
12. Water Leaks: If you encounter a major water leak, please shut-off the main water supply (found in the hall closet above the hot water heater) and call immediately. For small drips, please place a towel or bowl under the drip and notify us during normal hours. Please make sure you notify us if you suspect a leak (wet carpet, water under sink, etc) so that we can take care of it right away and minimize any damage to our condo or to a neighbor’s condo.
-
13. Your Belongings: Please gather all personal belongings before checking out. If we find you have left valuable items behind, we will contact you and arrange to return the items. The minimum charge to return forgotten items is $20.00 plus shipping fees.
-
14. Cancellation: If you cancel your reservation at least 60 days prior to your scheduled arrival date, you will receive a full refund except for a $100.00 cancellation fee (per condo) and any paid credit card fees. If you cancel your reservation less than 60 days from your arrival date, then no refunds or credit toward a different stay will be issued (except for cleaning fee, which will be refunded).
-
15. Refunds: There are no refunds (or credit toward a different stay) for Winterplace closures, poor snow conditions, severe weather, late arrivals, early departures, travel conditions, road closures, allergies, health or medical issues, utility or water outages, mandatory evacuation, construction at neighboring properties, war, terrorism or acts of God. We will make every
reasonable effort to ensure that the appliances, fireplaces, and like amenities are and remain in good working order.  However, there is no refund if these are inoperable.
-
15. Trip Insurance: We understand that circumstances may arise that affect your reservation. We recommend that you purchase Trip Insurance. We do not offer trip insurance, but there are many options available if you search the internet.  You should consider Cancel for Any Reason (CFAR) coverage since a typical policy without that extra coverage will not cover you in the event you want to cancel to due lack of snow, poor conditions, etc.
-
16. Cancellation by Owner: In the event the particular condo you have reserved is not available due to unforeseen circumstances, we will make every effort to relocate you into another one of our condos but assume no further liability. If there are no other condos available, then a complete refund will be given and we assume no further liability.
-
17. Condo Changes: The Owner reserves the right to change your reservation to another same-floor condo at the Owner’s discretion. Although rare, the Owner may need to assign you a different same-floor condo than the one you originally reserved due to scheduling constraints.
-
18.  Falsified Reservations: Any reservation made under false pretenses will be subject to forfeiture of booking deposit and rental payments, and check-in will not be allowed.
-
19. Binding Agreement, Agency, Warrants and Venue: Your rental agreement is a binding contract between you and the property Owner. The rental contract shall be interpreted and governed by West Virginia law. Any legal action pertaining to your rental must be brought exclusively in the appropriate court within Raleigh County, State of West Virginia.
-
20. Defend, Indemnify and Hold Harmless: As a condition of this rental agreement, to the fullest extent permitted by law, you as Guest, on behalf of yourself, members of your party and all their successors, assigns and heirs, agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the Owner and any of their employees, or representatives thereof, of and from any and all costs, suits, liabilities, damages and/or claims for damages arising from the acts or omissions of any person or which is in any other manner whatsoever related to the rental property and the related property, including but not limited to those arising from any kind of injury to or the death of any person or persons in, on or about the rental property and related property, or from any loss of or damage to the rental property or the personal property of any person or persons in, on or
about the rental property and related property, except that this indemnification does not extend to claims for personal injury actually caused solely by the grossly negligent acts or willful misconduct of the Owner or its employees.

name: OutlawHouse Riding in seconds!! Hatfield & McCoy
priceDetails/1/value: $15 per night after the first guest
sectionedDescription/description:
This is a vacation rental house that is located directly on the Outlaw trails of WV. We are also right in the middle of many Hatfield and McCoy trail systems.  You can ride these trails for months!! We believe we are in an excellent location to ride. Very close to the creek trail, local bars and places to eat as well as get passes for the trail systems

This house is set up for the quaintness of a couple of people to a huge group. You will have PLENTY of parking for your trucks and trailers. Great hangout areas outside after a long day of riding. There is a fire pit with a covered carport that has a gas grill as well as a charcoal grill. There is lighting and a huge picnic table. In the front is a nice porch with chairs and a swing very nice in the mornings.

You may contact us anytime you have questions or need any assistance

The wonderful part of this location is the area is safe with few neighbors. Nice and Quiet

You are allowed to ride your ATV's directly on the roads to the gas station, Family dollar to other towns WHEREVER! In case your machine has any issues there is a very close mechanic. We have personally used many many times.

sectionedDescription/neighborhoodOvervie: The wonderful part of this location is the area is safe with few neighbors. Nice and Quiet
sectionedDescription/space: This house is set up for the quaintness of a couple of people to a huge group. You will have PLENTY of parking for your trucks and trailers. Great hangout areas outside after a long day of riding. There is a fire pit with a covered carport that has a gas grill as well as a charcoal grill. There is lighting and a huge picnic table. In the front is a nice porch with chairs and a swing very nice in the mornings.
sectionedDescription/summary: This is a vacation rental house that is located directly on the Outlaw trails of WV. We are also right in the middle of many Hatfield and McCoy trail systems.  You can ride these trails for months!! We believe we are in an excellent location to ride. Very close to the creek trail, local bars and places to eat as well as get passes for the trail systems
sectionedDescription/transit: You are allowed to ride your ATV's directly on the roads to the gas station, Family dollar to other towns WHEREVER! In case your machine has any issues there is a very close mechanic. We have personally used many many times.

name: God's Country
photos/16/caption: Guest Bath
photos/20/caption: View from front porch. The mountain in the picture is part of the Hatfield McCoy trail system
sectionedDescription/access: Guest are able to access all areas of the property with the exception of the equipment garage at the end of the property.
sectionedDescription/description:
Property  is a ranch style house with wood siding, nestled against a hillside with a private setting. This property offers a large yard with a in-ground pool as well as a large front porch. There are two patio areas in the back with a built in grill station and a fire-pit to enjoy on those cool evenings. The house boasts six bedrooms, open concept living room, kitchen, and dining room area with gas fireplace, and large family room.Please  enter the correct number of guest

You get the entire house during your stay in a private setting where deer are often seen grazing on the hill or even in the yard. Open concept kitchen, living and dining room so that all the guests can enjoy being together as well as a separate large family room. All bedrooms are private and decorated with the host's genealogy.

Guest are able to access all areas of the property with the exception of the equipment garage at the end of the property.

The host will be available most of the time if needed, but will respect the guest's privacy.

Hatfield/McCoy Trails. Easy ATV access to Devil Anse trail head on the Hatfield-McCoy trail system (approximately 2 miles), not required to trailer ATV to trail system, close to ATV and kayak rentals, close to Historic Matewan, home of the Matewan Massacre and Hatfield-McCoy Feud historical sites. Visitors also have access to a grocery store, gas station, Family Dollar, Dollar General, etc. within two miles. Local restaurants include a delicious Mexican restaurant and a pizza place.

Most areas are accessible by vehicle or ATV. Visitors can enjoy walking along the flood wall in Matewan or nearby Hatfield-McCoy park.

In the heart of the famous Hatfield/McCoy feud,Matewan Massacre and Hatfield/McCoy trail system! Ride directly to devil ance,Rock house,Buffalo mtn trails and also outlaw trails !
